summary: An English nurse and an American soldier on the Italian front during World War I fall in love, but the horrors surrounding them test their romance to the limit.
cast: Rock Hudson|Jennifer Jones|Vittorio De Sica|Oskar Homolka|Mercedes McCambridge|Elaine Stritch|Kurt Kasznar|Victor Francen|Franco Interlenghi|Leopoldo Trieste|José Nieto|Georges Bréhat|Johanna Hofer|Eduard Linkers|Eva Kotthaus|Alberto Sordi|Luigi Barzini|Memmo Carotenuto|Patrick Crean|Albert D'Amario|Angelo Galassi|Stephen Garret|Guidarino Guidi|Carlo Hintermann|Peter Illing|Vittorio Jannitti|Diana King|Antonio La Raina|Sam Levene|Carlo Licari|Franco Mancinelli|Guido Martufi|Clelia Matania|Gisella Mathews|Peter Meersman|Tiberio Mitri|Alexis Revidis|Giacomo Rossi Stuart|Umberto Sacripante|Joan Shawlee|Umberto Spadaro|Bud Spencer

title: Adiós a las armas
